thread.title: Suite51 Media
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Suite51 Media

author: Suite51 Media
title: Suite51 Media
text:
I have been shopping with B&H for a few years now and they CONTINUALLY tend to be all. kinds. of AWESOME!
I love the service, product knowledge, shipping options, returns, etc.
For now, my ONLY quam... they are in NY!
What do u guys have against WEST COAST!
Hollywood is here... SHEESH!
lol
